title: Exquisite Polki & Ruby Peacock Jhumka - Mayura Kundanalu
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Central oval-cut diamond surrounded by uncut Polki diamonds
and ruby. Accented with freshwater pearls.
features: Intricately designed with a floral Polki diamond and emerald top, these Jhumkas feature a stunning peacock detail flowing down. The ruby-colored dome is embellished with a web-like design and fringed with delicate pearl and emerald drops. The unique Hyderabadi polish adds a rich lustre.
occasions: or any grand occasion where you want to make a statement. Ideal for muhurtham
description: This Jhumka showcases exceptional South Indian craftsmanship, blending the traditional charm of Polki diamonds with the vibrant colors and auspicious symbolism of rubies and peacocks. The use of natural gemstones and the meticulous attention to detail make this a valuable and timeless piece.
